Description:
We are seeking a Junior Electrical Revit Modeler to join our team in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia. As a Junior Electrical Revit Modeler.Responsibilities:Create and modify electrical models using Revit software.
Coordinate with the design team to ensure accurate and efficient modeling.
Review and interpret electrical design drawings and specifications.
Collaborate with other disciplines to ensure coordination and clash detection.
Experience in using AUTOCAD.
Participate in BIM coordination meetings and clash detection sessions.Skills
Skills: The ideal candidate will have at least 1-4 years of experience in electrical design and modeling using Revit software.

Bachelor's degree in electrical engineering or related field
1-4 years of experience in electrical design and modeling using Revit software
Proficient in Autodesk Revit, AutoCAD, and Navisworks
Knowledge of electrical codes and standards
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Proficiency in Autodesk Revit and AutoCAD
Knowledge of electrical codes and standards
Strong attention to detail
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
